content: "Hey Gabby, hope you're doing well. I just wanted to touch base and say that I had a really enjoyable time on our first date. I'd love to see you again if you're up for it, but I completely understand if you're not interested. No pressure at all, I just wanted to ask. And no worries about any "Ryan or Brian" energy here, I promise! A simple "no" is more than okay, and I'll still consider you a friend either way."
